message: ...I know what this is.
That dream again.
The one where I can't move. Where my body is being eaten.
...It's happening.
My right arm is already gone. And my left leg, as well.
Now the darkness nibbles at my remaining limbs, inching closer and closer to my core.
There's no pain, only the shock of loss.
And a sound that I can't hear, only feel. The sound of bones crunching...
My limbs are gone. Next comes my...
...With each bite the darkness takes from my torso, something seems to grow inside of me.
An impulse.
The impulse to destroy.
Just like the darkness consuming me, I want to destroy... everything.
Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.<K> Destroy.
That's my true desire.
My... true desire?
My... true...
